name: Squeak Your Last (WIP)
description:
This is a Work In Progress game, if you have the time, please give us some feedback & take our feedback survey! We would really appreciate it! 

In this local co-op puzzle platformer, grab a friend and enter the magical world of Rodentia, where you'll play as two legendary assassin mice on a perilous mission to poison a human prince.

Become Salt and Pepper, the twin assassin mice of prophecy, and embark on a journey they were born for. Collect peanuts to give the tyrannical Prince Nicholas a deadly allergic reaction, and end the bloody war between humans and mice. The Kingdom of Rodentia is counting on you, so cheese don't fail!

Work together to teleport, tinker, and tiptoe your way through the dusty bowels of a castle storeroom. An "every mouse for themselves" policy won't work here - put your lives in each other's fuzzy little paws!

Face a myriad of puzzles that will test your wits and leave you scratching your whiskers. Pressure plates, mouseholes, building blocks, and more - just what kind of storeroom is this? Use both your brains and your brawn, or risk walking away with your tail between your legs.

Use your magic to swap places with items in the level! Build yourself a friend to help get to hard to reach places!
PepperSaltMovementA , D & W to move and jump
J, L & I to move and jump
AbilityE:  Create a dummy friend!
Q: Destroy dummy friend...N: Swap places with an item in the level!

Other: R to reset current level

We are Bitmapped Studios, a group of 2nd year game dev & game art students! Squeak Your Last is our 2nd year game project and we hope you enjoy it!

  • Mat – Design
  • Leah – Design/Art 
  • Petr – Programming
  • Ama – Programming
  • Jenni – Writing          
  • Ben – Animation
  • Maddie – Art
  • Amber – Art
  • Toby – Art
  • Petrana – Art
